review_data.title: Avoid this place, you will be overcharged
review_data.content: Bad service, this place scams customers. They kept bringing things we didn’t order so they could charge us extra at the end. We had all you can eat. You have to pay for what you don’t eat. Rude staff, food was mediocre. Avoid this place

review_data.title: Best sushi in Zurich
